column2: "Ah! Oh, it's just you, <%me>. What a coincidence, meeting you here."
"Um, have you seen Dr. Aki lately?"
"It seems that the next investigation Dr. Aki is planning is in a dangerous place and I, uh..."
"... to be honest, I'm really worried about her."
"The director said her research has no value, but that's not what I think..."
"I may be a spy from Void, but I was with Dr. Aki the entire time, and I got to see everything she strove for."
"It may not be my place to say my feelings have changed, but I wonder about what she's after."
"I wonder what I should do in a situation like this."
"She'd definitely say, \"if you have time on your hands, then do more research!\"."
